name: Coin Actions
description:
3D Action adventure Demo

Controls : WASD/ SPACEBAR/U/I

Coin Actions Started Back In 2016 As A Small Project and Lead To Abandoning the project and now Iron Sword Games ported the whole game to a new game engine called GODOT.

 Also the name changed of the project to GOBALL  And a new Implementation is in development.

For Now You Can Checkout Our Old Technology Game Demo Coin actions, Try To Catch all the coins in the levels provided.Please Be aware that the project is incomplete and may have bugs and performance issues No Sound Was Implemented.
